name: Three Viewer
author: Ofek Nakar

sections.description:
Three Viewer provide an free and easy solution to visualize any 3D Models on your website,
with Three Viewer Editor you can edit and add lights or ground object and more to your 3D environment easily,
our viewer is interactive you can pin,drag,and use your mouse wheel to view the model from any angle you wish

  • Easy to Install
  • Easy to Edit/manage

A brief Example

Installation:

  1. Activate
  2. Navigate to ThreeViewer Menu
  3. Upload&Customize your 3D Model
  4. Copy & paste ThreViewer shortcode on any page

Hello,Hola,Shalom from MapleWP :), if there any need or support issue,you can reach us via
Website maple-wp.com

ThreeViewer MapleWP
sections.faq:
What ThreeViewer Does ?

ThreeViewer is 3D visualize tool

Can i edit my model inside ThreeViewer?

Yes you can edit your model size/position/rotation
and add lights and ground to your 3d environment

Which files ThreeViewer is support ?

right now we support gltf/glb/fbx files,
in the near future we will add more options

ThreeViewer is support gltf ?

yes, we support gltf&fbx

Where can i paste the shortocde ?

you can paste the shortcode on any page
